org.ujorm.tools.dom.XmlElement

  • Packages that use XmlElement 
    Package Description
    org.ujorm.tools.dom  

    • Uses of XmlElement in org.ujorm.tools.dom

      Subclasses of XmlElement in org.ujorm.tools.dom 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HtmlElement
      XML element model to rendering a HTML file How to use the class: 
       final HtmlElement html = new HtmlElement("Test");
 html.getBody().addElement("div")
               .addText("Hello word!")
